resources.string: ☑Feel free to use these lounge rooms!\n☑Be careful not to be too noisy at night.\n☑Please keep your valuables with you.
☑This is in another building and able to be used until 10pm.\n However you need make a reservation ahead of time
☑Wash and dry the tableware and utensils after each use.\n☑Return them to their original locations before you leave the kitchen.

☑Food must be stored in the refrigerator in each individual’s room
 ☑All items stored in the communal refrigerator must be clearly marked with date and room number.
 ☑Your food might be abandoned if you leave it for a while if it doesn’t have personal information on it.
 ☑Basically, you should pick your food up before one week pass
☑Do not leave cooked rice in the rice cooker.\n☑Wash the container and inner lid.
☑Please use white towels to clean dishes and blue ones for tables.
☑Seasoning and food for personal use must be kept in your own food box.

☑Cleaners come a few times a week. 
 ☑Do not cook here except boiling water.
 ☑Overnight staying of non-residents from midnight to 8 o’clock in the morning is strictly prohibited.
 ☑The wall is so thin that the sound you make in your room can go through to others’ rooms and vise versa. Let’s not be too noisy.
☑Clear away your hair and dry the floor of the shower room after each use.
